SELECT NA_WRS_C ,WRSNM ,BOXPE_AQZ ,CODE.SIMP_CNM ,VCBT_NA_WRS_C ,VCBX_NA_WRS_C FROM TB_GD_WRS WRS ,TB_CM_SIMPC CODE WHERE CODE.SIMP_TPC='TXT_DSC' AND CODE.SIMP_C=WRS.TXT_DSC AND WRS.DEL_YN='0'
AND WRS.NA_WRS_C IN ( SELECT NA_WRS_C FROM TB_OD_TRTWRS WHERE SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C IN ( SELECT NA_TRPL_C FROM TB_TR_TRPL_CIF WHERE UP_NA_TRPL_C IN ( SELECT UP_NA_TRPL_C FROM TB_TR_TRPL_CIF WHERE NA_TRPL_C = #{NA_TRPL_C} ) ) )
AND NA_WRS_C like '${searchText}%'
AND WRSNM like '${searchText}%'
AND X=1

SELECT A.NA_TRPL_C, A.CLNTNM , B.NA_TEAM_C, B.TEAMNM FROM TB_TR_TRPL_CIF A,TB_CM_TEAM B WHERE A.NA_TRPL_C = B.NA_BZPLC(+)
AND A.NA_TRPL_C = #{searchText}
AND A.CLNTNM LIKE '${searchText}%'
AND X=1
AND A.DEL_YN='0'
ORDER BY A.NA_TRPL_C, B.NA_TEAM_C

SELECT NA_TRPL_C, CLNTNM, NA_USR_SYS_KDC , BIZ_NUMBER, TRIM(SUBSTR(DONGUP,1,30)) ADDR1, TRIM(SUBSTR(DONGBW,1,30)) ADDR2, FZIP || '-' || RZIP ZIP, NA_MBCO_DSC FROM TB_TR_TRPL_CIF WHERE NAAC_DSC='9' AND DEL_YN='0'
AND NA_TRPL_C = #{searchText}
AND CLNTNM LIKE '${searchText}%'
AND X=1
ORDER BY NA_TRPL_C, CLNTNM

SELECT NA_BZPLC, NA_TEAM_C, BUYER_ENO, ecl_decrypt(BUYER_NM) as BUYER_NM, DEPTNM, CHRG_BSNNM, ecl_decrypt(MPNO) as MPNO, OFT, OPNP_YN FROM TB_CM_BUYER WHERE NA_BZPLC='8808983000015' AND NA_TEAM_C='00' AND DEL_DTM IS NULL
AND BUYER_ENO = #{searchText}
AND BUYER_NM LIKE '${searchText}%'
AND X=1
